about.title: About Me
about.name: Alexander — Software Engineer
about.description: I'm a professional software developer with extensive experience in building enterprise solutions and web applications. I work on projects using ASP Core, Vue3, Blazor, Yii2, and Bitrix, and I also develop games with Unity.

professional.title: Professional Skills
professional.experience: Over 5 years of programming and development experience.
professional.skills: Proficient in C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Unity, ASP.NET Core, Vue.js, and other technologies.
professional.currentProjects: Currently working on a corporate portal in Bitrix and a portal using Yii2.
